price: This is Allah’s creation. So show Me what others besides Him have created. In fact, the wrongdoers are clearly misguided.
arabic: هَٰذَا خَلۡقُ ٱللَّهِ فَأَرُونِي مَاذَا خَلَقَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦۚ بَلِ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
